effect.sun_moon: Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, the wild encounter rate is doubled. This ability has no effect in battle.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, the wild encounter rate is doubled. This ability has no effect in battle.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, the wild encounter rate is doubled. This ability has no effect in battle.

flavor_text.sun_moon: Raises the likelihood of meeting wild Pokémon by illuminating the surroundings.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Raises the likelihood of meeting wild Pokémon by illuminating the surroundings.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Raises the likelihood of meeting wild Pokémon by illuminating the surroundings.
